data.eml:eml: New records of bee flies (Diptera, Bombyliidae) from Cuatro Cienegas, Coahuila, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Avalos-Hernandez, Omar, Kits, Joel, Trujano-Ortega, Marysol, Garcia-Vazquez, Uri Omar, Cano-Santana, Zenon (2014): New records of bee flies (Diptera, Bombyliidae) from Cuatro Cienegas, Coahuila, Mexico. ZooKeys 422: 49-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.422.7598, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.422.7598
